name: Morning Getaway
description:
A minimalistic rhythm fishing game. Made for the https://www.creativebrew.io event "Morning Getaway"

Use A S D keys to play

Turn on fullscreen for best experience

Music used provided by NoCopyrightSounds:

  • Tollef - Like A Stone
  • Diviners - Escape (feat. Rossy)
  • JJD - A New Adventure (feat. Molly Ann)
